title: Problems launching
body:
Hi there guys,

I have this problem when i want to enter the game: a small window pops up saying "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working"
I don't think is from the new patch since i played last night and didn't had any problems.
If any of you had encountered this problem and know what is is can you please help me?

Thank you

replies.body: The kernel error is commonly due to a security setting on your OS that's blocking the patcher from launching.  Go over each step in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to allow access and get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Hey there, have you tried running league of legends with administrator on (right click and press run as administrator). Hope this helps

Thank you Holymolay. It works.
Forgot about that :P
